about.details:
Incorporated in April 2003, Aluwind Architectural Limited manufactures and installs a diverse range of aluminium products. These include windows, doors, curtain walls, cladding, and glazing systems, all meticulously crafted to meet architects, consultants, builders, institutions, and corporations' unique needs.

The company has expanded its market presence, selling products in various cities across India, including Mumbai, Pune, Bangalore, and Hyderabad. This demonstrates a wide reach and commitment to serving customers nationwide.

The company's profits after tax for FY21, FY22, FY23, and H1 FY23 were INR 76.92L, INR 78.80L, INR 270.05L, and INR 372.83L, respectively.

The company has a manufacturing unit located in Pune, Maharastra spread across an area of 45000 square foot.

The company's clientele includes real estate developers such as L&T and Birla, which helps them to bag diverse projects through competitive bidding.

As of September 30, 2023, the company had 178 permanent employees. The company regularly trains its employees to increase operational excellence, improve productivity, and maintain compliance standards on quality and safety.

faqs.question: What is the Aluwind Architectural IPO?
faqs.answer:
Aluwind Architectural IPO is a SME IPO of 6600000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹29.70 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹45 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on March 28, 2024, and closes on April 4, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Aluwind Architectural IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Aluwind Architectural IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Aluwind Architectural IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Aluwind Architectural IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Aluwind Architectural IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Aluwind Architectural IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Aluwind Architectural IPO opens on March 28, 2024 and closes on April 4, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Aluwind Architectural IPO?
faqs.answer: Aluwind Architectural IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,35,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Aluwind Architectural IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Aluwind Architectural IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Aluwind Architectural IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Aluwind Architectural IPO will be done on Friday, April 5, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, April 8, 2024. Check the Aluwind Architectural IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Aluwind Architectural IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Aluwind Architectural IPO listing date is on Tuesday, April 9, 2024.
